field_mappings.notes: OrderNumber is the unique service order identifier in ES, maps to Circuit Code identifier in BBF
Service ID is the primary service identifier in ES, maps to ASRID (service identifier) in BBF
Direct boolean match for TSP (Telecommunications Service Priority) flag
Service_Provided__c contains bandwidth in Mbps (numeric), needs conversion to Circuit_Capacity__c string format
Customer-facing circuit identifier - using searchable Service ID field from ES
ActivatedDate (datetime) needs conversion to Active_Date__c (date only)
General notes/comments field for technical documentation
ES has single Node__c field, BBF has A_Node and Z_Node - may need business logic to determine A vs Z
Ring topology reference - may relate to Z Node in BBF architecture, needs validation
Service_End_Date__c is the date service terminates, maps directly to Disconnect_Date__c
PON (Purchase Order Number) - field types differ (textarea vs string), may need truncation
Order_Link__c may contain URL/reference to secondary order - needs parsing to extract circuit ID
Primary_Product_Name__c describes the product type sold, maps to Product_Type__c
Duplicate of Circuit_Capacity__c - Service_Provided__c numeric needs string conversion with units
Business_Sector__c categorizes customer industry, maps to Business_Unit__c organizational grouping
Match_Key__c used for deduplication - OrderNumber is unique identifier suitable for matching
Date_Synced_To_Billing__c tracks when record synced to billing system - maps to Unified_DB sync tracking
Order_Type_Data_Load__c is multipicklist (New, Change, Renewal, etc.), BBF Change_Type__c is single picklist - needs logic to select primary type
EffectiveDate is contract start date, maps directly to Contract_Effective_Date__c
Contract_End_Date_Est__c is estimated contract end, maps to Contract_Expiration_Date__c
Service_Term_Months_Est__c is contract term in months, direct numeric match to Contract_Term__c
Last_Mile_Carrier__c is reference to carrier account - needs to extract carrier code/name for BBF string field
Total_Vendor_MRC_Offnet__c is monthly cost for off-net services - COGS for off-net circuits
TSP_Code_Value__c contains actual TSP code string, maps to TSP_Code__c identifier
Build_Type_Address_Z__c indicates On-Net Lit/New or Off-Net - maps to service access build type in BBF
Design_Proposed_Facility_A__c describes A-side facility/handoff location
CompanyAuthorizedDate is when company accepted/authorized the order
Sales_Rep__c reference needs to extract user name for Account_Manager__c text field
Order_Completion_Notice_Sent__c is when activation notice sent to customer
Last_Order_Comment__c is most recent comment on order, maps to Last_Note__c
Referring_Vendor_Agent__c contains agent/vendor information for referral tracking
End_Reason_Notes__c provides disconnect reason details - may need truncation from 8000 to 255 chars
Estimated_Completion_Date__c (ECD) is project completion target, maps to Due_Date__c
Service_Delivery_Manager__c reference needs name extraction for Engineer__c text field
Vendor_Circuit_ID__c is vendor's circuit identifier - may map to EVC circuit code
NNI_CID__c is Network-to-Network Interface circuit ID - secondary EVC identifier
Confirmed_FOC_Date__c is Firm Order Commitment date for off-net circuits
No ES field for power/datacenter kWh rate - BBF specific field for colocation services
OSS_Order__c is operational support system order number - may relate to ISP work order
No ES field for power capacity - BBF specific for colocation/datacenter power contracts
General notes field - exact API name match between ES and BBF
OSP_Engineer__c reference needs name extraction for BBF text field
OSS_Order__c may track OSP work order - needs validation if OSS and OSP orders are same
CreatedById is user who created order - needs name lookup for Order_Received_By__c text
CreatedDate datetime needs conversion to Order_Received_Date__c date only
First_Estimated_Completion_Date_ECD__c is original ECD - may correspond to original FOC
OSP_Confirmation_Date__c is when outside plant work confirmed complete
OSP_Needed__c boolean needs conversion to text 'Yes/No' for Outside_Plant_Required__c
Service_Category_Multi__c multipicklist needs conversion to single Opportunity_Type__c picklist value
Initially_Activated_By__c user reference needs name extraction for Provisioned_By__c text
Service_Order_Details_Replacing__c contains details of replacement order - needs parsing for circuit code
Service_Order_Agreement_Replacing__c reference to order being replaced - needs OrderNumber lookup
Sales_Rep__c user reference - extract name for Sales_Engineer__c text field
Service_Order_Agreement_MRC_Amortized__c is monthly recurring revenue - maps to Last_MRC__c
Dimension_1_Location__c is state/location dimension for service - maps to Service_State__c
CustomerAuthorizedDate is when customer signed/authorized - maps to Sign_Date__c
No clear ES field for UNI (User Network Interface) circuit code - BBF specific for Ethernet services
Design_Proposed_Facility_Z__c describes Z-side facility - may map to ZZ transport location
Design_Proposed_Facility_Z__c describes Z-side handoff point
Cancellation_Date__c exact match for Canceled_Date__c
End_Reason_Notes__c provides cancellation reason details
NTP_Requested__c is Notice to Proceed date for equipment - maps to NTP_Date__c
No ES field for circuit framing (ESF, D4, etc.) - technical specification BBF tracks for legacy circuits
No ES field for regulatory jurisdiction (Interstate, Intrastate, etc.) - BBF telecom regulatory field
No ES field for line coding (B8ZS, AMI, etc.) - technical T1/DS1 specification BBF tracks
No ES field for Primary Interexchange Carrier code - BBF specific for carrier access billing
No ES field for Primary Transmit/Receive Loss Values - BBF technical circuit parameter
No ES field for billing rate code classification - BBF specific billing system field
No ES field for FCC revenue classification (303.1, 304.2, etc.) - BBF regulatory reporting requirement
No ES field for Secondary Interexchange Carrier code - BBF billing system field
No ES field for Secondary Transmit/Receive Loss Values - BBF technical parameter
No ES field for End User vs Reseller classification - BBF financial/billing classification
Primary_Product_Family__c may indicate if Voice/Data/Video - needs parsing to map to Signal_Type__c picklist
No ES field for surcharge exemption status - BBF billing/tax system field
No ES field for tax exemption status - BBF billing/tax system field (account-level in ES)
No ES field for circuit type classification (A/B/C/D) - BBF billing system categorization
No ES equivalent - BBF system field to control which COPS fields can be edited
No ES equivalent - BBF specific notes field for date-related information
Description is general order description - maps to General_Description__c
No ES equivalent - BBF rollup count field
Billing_Reference__c contains billing-related notes - maps to Financial_Notes__c
No ES equivalent - BBF specific for datacenter/colocation services
Notes_from_Sales_Engineering__c may contain location-specific engineering notes
No ES equivalent - BBF rollup count field
Primary_Product_Family__c describes product category - may map to service type derivation
Product_Sold_Details__c describes products sold - maps to Products_From_Charges__c
Total_Vendor_MRC_Offnet__c is vendor monthly cost - represents MRC COGS
Last_Mile_Carrier__c reference - extract carrier name for A location COGS provider
Last_Mile_Carrier__c reference - extract carrier name for Z location COGS provider (may be different if diverse)
PoNumber is purchase order number - direct match to PO__c
No ES equivalent - BBF specific executive notes field
No ES equivalent - BBF datacenter-specific notes
No ES equivalent - BBF Inside Plant notes field
No ES equivalent - BBF operations notes field
OSP_Notes__c exact match - Outside Plant engineering notes
No ES equivalent - BBF Service Delivery notes field
No ES equivalent - BBF contract renewal pricing field
No ES equivalent - BBF price escalation percentage field
No ES equivalent - BBF price escalation frequency
No ES equivalent - BBF escalation clause text
No ES equivalent - BBF price escalation start date
Legacy_Site_ID__c may map to FA Code/Site ID for tracking
No ES equivalent - BBF contract management notes
Service_End_Reasons__c picklist values need mapping to BBF Disconnect_Reason_Codes__c values
Notes_from_Sales_Person_Full__c contains sales notes - maps to Sales_Note__c
No ES equivalent - BBF price increase notification tracking
No ES equivalent - BBF month-to-month rate increase amount
No ES equivalent - BBF agent classification field
No ES equivalent - BBF datacenter power usage tracking
No ES equivalent - BBF network monitoring sensor IDs (1-4)
No ES equivalent - BBF network monitoring field
No ES equivalent - BBF network monitoring field
No ES equivalent - BBF network monitoring field

picklist_mappings.es_value: Service Replaced with Different ES Product

picklist_mappings.suggested_mapping: Change in Ownership | Replaced by New BBF Circuit | Service no longer required | Undisclosed
